definition: Qieyun, the first Chinese rime dictionary from 601 AD, containing 11,500 single-character entries
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound

sentences.english: The later is also one of the main headstreams of voices recorded in Qie Yun.
sentences.chinese: 古關中話也是《切韻》所記錄語音的主要源頭之一。

sentences.english: Chongyun is a special phonetic phenomenon in Guangyun phonology , What actually Chongyun implies, which has been a puzzle in study field.
sentences.chinese: 重韻是《切韻》音系中比較特殊的一種語音現象。
